body.table:
TO#
Date From To
Amount Ord. Amount Rec.
Ord - Rec.
INV#
Harga per Ctn Ordered Fulfilled Amount Ord. Amount Rec. Sisa Ord. - Rec.
IR#
Date Ctn/Pcs
Amount Rec.
<#list test.dataSetFinal as data1> <#list transferOrder.tempDataSet as data>
<#if data.transfer_order.isExist == "0" && data1.transfer_order.isExist == "0" && data1.transfer_order.documentNumber == data.transfer_order.documentNumber && data.transfer_order.amount_order_total != "0" && data.transfer_order.isReceipt == "false">
${data.transfer_order.documentNumber}
${data.transfer_order.tanggal} ${data.transfer_order.lokasi} ${data.transfer_order.lokasiTo}
${(data.transfer_order.amount_order_total?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${(data.transfer_order.amount_recieved_total?number)?string[",##0"]}.00
${(data.transfer_order.amount_sisa_total?number)?string[",##0"]}.00
</#if> </#list> <#if data1.data_item.documentNumberParam == data1.transfer_order.documentNumber && data1.data_item.isExist == "0" && data1.transfer_order.documentNumber != "empty" && data1.data_item.isKomplitInv == "T">
${data1.data_item.item}
${(data1.data_item.price?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${data1.data_item.carton} / ${data1.data_item.pcs} ${data1.data_item.cartonFullfillemntTotal} / ${data1.data_item.pcsFullfillmentTotal} ${(data1.data_item.amount_order?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${(data1.data_item.amount_recieved?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${data1.data_item.sisa_carton} / ${data1.data_item.sisa_pcs} ${((data1.data_item.amount_order?number)-(data1.data_item.amount_recieved?number))?string[",##0"]}.00
<#elseif data1.data_item.documentNumberParam == data1.transfer_order.documentNumber && data1.data_item.isExist == "0" && data1.transfer_order.documentNumber != "empty" && data1.data_item.isKomplitInv == "F" && header.item != "ALL">
${data1.data_item.item}
${(data1.data_item.price?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${data1.data_item.carton} / ${data1.data_item.pcs} ${data1.data_item.cartonFullfillemntTotal} / ${data1.data_item.pcsFullfillmentTotal} ${(data1.data_item.amount_order?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${(data1.data_item.amount_recieved?number)?string[",##0"]}.00 ${data1.data_item.sisa_carton} / ${data1.data_item.sisa_pcs} ${((data1.data_item.amount_order?number)-(data1.data_item.amount_recieved?number))?string[",##0"]}.00
</#if> <#if data1.data_receipt.documentNumberParam == data1.transfer_order.documentNumber && data1.data_receipt.type == "ItemRcpt" && data1.data_receipt.isKomplitPurch == "T" && data1.data_item.isKomplitInv == "T">
${data1.data_receipt.documentNumberFullfillment}
${data1.data_receipt.tanggalFullFillment} ${data1.data_receipt.cartonFullfillemnt}/${data1.data_receipt.pcsFullfillment}
${(data1.data_receipt.amountRecievedEachReciept?number)?string[",##0"]}.00
<#elseif data1.data_receipt.documentNumberParam == data1.transfer_order.documentNumber && data1.data_receipt.type == "ItemRcpt" && data1.data_receipt.isKomplitPurch == "T" && data1.data_item.isKomplitInv == "F" && header.item != "ALL">
${data1.data_receipt.documentNumberFullfillment}
${data1.data_receipt.tanggalFullFillment} ${data1.data_receipt.cartonFullfillemnt}/${data1.data_receipt.pcsFullfillment}
${(data1.data_receipt.amountRecievedEachReciept?number)?string[",##0"]}.00
</#if>
</#list>
